summary: David Chalmers was born in 1966. He has lived in Australia all of his life.
full_text: David John Chalmers  is an Australian philosopher and cognitive scientist specializing in the area of philosophy of mind and philosophy of language. He is Professor of Philosophy and Director of the Centre for Consciousness at the Australian National University. He is also Professor of Philosophy at New York University. In 2013, he was elected a Fellow of the American Academy of Arts & Sciences.
title: David Chalmers
